mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user (uno, user_name , user_id , pwd , email, phone ,post_code, addr ,addr2) values (seq_user.nextval,#{user_name},#{user_id},#{pwd},#{email},#{phone},#{post_code},#{addr},#{addr2})
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select * from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id} and pwd = #{pwd}
select user_id from tbl_user where user_name = #{user_name} and phone = #{phone}
select pwd from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_name = #{user_name} and phone = #{phone}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set pwd = #{pwd} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(buy_status) from tbl_user_buy where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id} and pwd = #{pwd}
